biotools.summary: Software package for inferring highways of horizontal gene transfer in the evolutionary history of a set of species. It takes as input a collection of unrooted gene trees along with a rooted species tree.

bioschemas.name: HiDe
bioschemas.summary: Software package for inferring highways of horizontal gene transfer in the evolutionary history of a set of species. It takes as input a collection of unrooted gene trees along with a rooted species tree.
